channel.title: Jdk installation
channel.description:
I need help on how to install my JDK for my compiler to work, if your compiler doesn't work then moparscape is basically useless.
Can anyone help me please? I'm not asking for a TUT im just asking for how to do it, maybe like a few steps.

item.title: Jdk installation
item.dc:creator: @Steviie Steviie
item.description:
@Steviie wrote:

Learn to read? I did what you said. I put _'s in the spaces.
Second, L2Read I said I need help installing JDK.
Third, they are all in 1 post.

So, tell me something that is correct.

Read full topic

item.title: Jdk installation
item.dc:creator: @jungledude jungledude
item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

I’ve had to answer this question a lot lately. The new version of JDK has not been added in the old Compilers because it has a different file name.

Go to C:\Program Files\Java

There you will see a file. right click your compiler and press edit (you’ll have to edit where I tell you to)

@echo off
Title EyreScape Client Compiler
color 03
echo Compiling...
"C:\Program Files\Java\JAVA FILE NAME HERE\bin\javac" *.java -nowarn *.java
color 03
echo Complete!

pause

User _'s for spaces. After compiling you should get… Well I cant get it atm because I’m working on something that is giving me errors.

Read full topic
